questions.question: She ___ to work by bus every day.
The meeting will start ___ 9 a.m.
Please ___ the attached form.
Mr. Lee is responsible ___ sales.
This report is ___ than the last one.
Employees must wear ID badges ___ all times.
The office will be closed ___ Sunday.
Please submit the report ___ Friday.
The new policy applies ___ all employees.
She is responsible ___ managing the team.
The manager requested that all reports ___ submitted by Friday.
Employees are encouraged to attend the training session ___ their schedule allows.
The conference room was reserved ___ the entire afternoon.
Ms. Taylor has been working at the company ___ 2019.
The brochure provides detailed information ___ the new product line.
The CEO announced that profits had increased ___ last year.
All applicants must submit their resumes ___ the deadline.
The report was rejected because it was not ___ prepared.
The marketing team is responsible ___ developing advertising strategies.
Please contact the HR department ___ you have any questions.
The shipment arrived later than ___ expected.
The assistant will arrange the meeting ___ the director’s availability.
The proposal was approved ___ its high projected revenue.
Customers are advised to read the instructions ___ using the device.
The presentation was postponed ___ the speaker was unavailable.
The office will remain closed ___ further notice.
The company plans to expand its operations ___ Asia next year.
Employees must comply ___ the company’s safety regulations.
The accountant verified the figures to ensure they were ___.
The new software update will improve system ___ significantly.

Read the passage: 

"All employees are required to submit their monthly reports by the last working day of each month. Late submissions may result in delays in salary processing."

What is the main purpose of this announcement?
questions.a: To explain how salaries are calculated
questions.b: To inform employees about report deadlines
questions.c: To announce a change in working hours
questions.d: To introduce a new reporting system

questions.question:
Read the passage:

"Participants who register after July 1 will be charged an additional late fee. Confirmation emails will be sent within two business days of registration."

According to the passage, when will confirmation emails be sent?

Read the passage:

"The manager postponed the meeting to allow additional time for preparation."

What does the word "postponed" most nearly mean?

Read the passage:

"This notice is to remind staff that all security badges must be displayed at all times while on company premises. Failure to comply may result in disciplinary action."

Why was this notice most likely written?
questions.a: To introduce a new security badge system
questions.b: To explain how to obtain a security badge
questions.c: To remind employees of an existing policy

questions.question:
Read the passage:

"This notice is to remind staff that all security badges must be displayed at all times while on company premises. Failure to comply may result in disciplinary action."

Why was this notice most likely written?
questions.a: To introduce a new security badge system
questions.b: To explain how to obtain a security badge
questions.c: To remind employees of an existing policy

questions.question: The report was submitted ___ the manager had approved all revisions.
The marketing campaign was considered successful, ___ it did not immediately increase sales.
Applicants are required to submit all documents ___ the deadline stated in the announcement.
The new policy aims to improve efficiency by ___ unnecessary administrative procedures.

Read the passage:

"Employees who fail to complete the mandatory training may be restricted from accessing certain company systems."

What will most likely happen if employees do not complete the training?
questions.c: Their system access may be limited

questions.question: The consultant recommended that the proposal ___ revised before submission.

Read the passage:

"Due to budget constraints, the project timeline has been extended by two months."

Why was the project schedule changed?
The word "constraints" in the passage most nearly means:
Only after the audit was completed ___ the company release its annual financial statement.
The manager emphasized the importance of adhering strictly ___ company regulations.
